name: Moto-cross Mountain Hill Dirt Bike High-way Stunt Rider - Free Kid-s Race Game
name_original: Moto-cross Mountain Hill Dirt Bike High-way Stunt Rider - Free Kid-s Race Game
description:
It's time to show off your motocross racing skills in this new action packed game!

Race against some of the fastest motocross riders out there in this arcade style adventure! Collect enough coins and you will be able to unlock brand new bikes and gear.

This game contains:

-High definition retina graphics!
-Super addictive racing gameplay!
-Game Center capabilities to compete against friends!

Don't wait now, download today!
